Test Name: Cerebrospinal Fluid IgG Index Profile (Serum and CSF)
Purpose: Quantitative determination of the IgG Index to assess immunoglobulin G levels in CSF relative to serum for diagnostic evaluation.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) for blood; sterile container for CSF
Equipment: Centrifuge, pipettes, analytical balance, ELISA reader or spectrophotometer
